name: SoulRadio
0:
”Alexa, Soul Radio.”
”Alexa, play soul radio.”
”Alexa, open soul radio.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soul radio
des: SOUL RADIO #1 classic soul music station, focusing on soul music from the 1950s-1970s, occasionally venturing into the 1980s. We also play Motown sound, Chicago Soul, Philadelphia sound, Southern soul, Memphis soul, Psychedelic soul and British soul. SoulRadio is timeless. Commercial free
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
